title: Small script
content:
Anyone have an idea what the typeface is for "Resort" in this Holiday Inn logo? Sorry it's so small, but it's the best I have.

Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [holidayinn.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015015915/http:/typophile.com/files/holidayinn_0.png) | 19.67 KB |
author: jonsel

comments.content:
I think this is probably custom lettering, but you might approximate it by slanting [One Stroke Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015015915/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/one-stroke-script/) from Letraset.

- Mike Yanega
